name: io.github.roddutra/agent-mcp-gateway
title: Agent MCP Gateway
description: On-demand tool discovery for all your MCPs and per-subagent MCP controls to preserve context window.

environmentVariables.name: GATEWAY_MCP_CONFIG
environmentVariables.description: Path to MCP servers configuration file (default: .mcp.json)

environmentVariables.name: GATEWAY_RULES
environmentVariables.description: Path to gateway access control rules file (default: .mcp-gateway-rules.json)

environmentVariables.name: GATEWAY_DEFAULT_AGENT
environmentVariables.description: Default agent ID when not provided in tool calls

environmentVariables.name: GATEWAY_DEBUG
environmentVariables.description: Enable debug mode and expose diagnostic tools (default: false)
